content: @Michel Rutten I have the same bug which @Jayashree Surnar mentions in the #implementers stream when I use the new STU3 version of Forge. If I only save the differential, Forge works fine, but if I try to save the snapshot as well, Forge becomes jammed. Maybe this could be fixed in an update?

Hi @Omar El-Begawy thank you for reporting this issue. We'll investigate and try to fix this in the next release.
BTW it may help to clean up the source directory and subfolders, i.e. (re-)move all unrelated/invalid XML files.
Hi @Michel Rutten I also got the same bug while saving a profile on forge. Please fix it at the earliest. Thank you
Hi @Pranitha Sruthi, please note that we provide incident support to our commercial customers. Feel free to contact me if you want more information.
@Michel Rutten Okay thank you
Hi @Michel Rutten may I know when will you be able to fix the bug ? Thank you
